name: Debugging Session
description:
DISCLAIMER: This is a simulation.  You are not punching any bugs, you are punching your keyboard.  I'm not responsible for your poor decisions while playing this game.

You sit down at your desk one day to hear some scurrying inside of your keyboard...  When was the last time you cleaned it out?

Credits & Attributions:
  • Music: "Low Growl" by  Yadu Rajiv
  • Additional Sounds: freesound.org
  • Images: Wikimedia Commons

Note:  Not every keyboard is the same - some keyboards might have issues with ghosting keys or rollover, which can significantly effect how you play this game.  Unfortunately there's not much we can do about that :(
